Q1_FY2026.notes: Revenue Rs 14,855-15,351 cr marking 28.8-33% YoY growth. Mobile segment Rs 13,361 cr (+41%). Telecom surged +148%.

Q2_FY2026.notes: Revenue jumped 30.76% YoY. Net profit jumped 71.86% YoY. EBITDA Rs 1,057 cr at 7.1% margin.

Q3_FY2026.notes: Revenue Rs 10,364-10,678 cr (+2% YoY). Mobiles/EMS Rs 9,750 cr. Consumer electronics Rs 567 cr. Home appliances Rs 355 cr. Revenue growth flattened due to intensifying competition in mobile assembly.

FY2024.notes: Revenue Rs 6,411.40 cr. Operating profit grew to Rs 697.63 cr.

FY2025_TTM.notes: TTM revenue Rs 48,655 cr, profit Rs 1,811 cr (massive growth from FY2024)

keyRatios.notes: Very high ROE (32.8%) and ROCE (40%). Low leverage (D/E 0.07). Premium PB of 17x reflects high-growth EMS business model.

balanceSheetHighlights.notes: Low debt (D/E 0.07-0.17). Capital-light EMS model. Leading electronics manufacturer in India across consumer electronics, mobile phones, wearables, home appliances, and telecom hardware.
